mapper.sql: id, teacher_id AS teacherId, teacher_name AS teacherName, class_id AS classId, class_name AS className, task_id AS taskId, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime
mapper.select: SELECT ptt.teacher_id teacherId, ptt.teacher_name teacherName, ptt.subject_id subjectId, ps.subject_name subjectName, ptc.class_id classId, ptc.class_name className, pcr.room_id roomId, pcr.room_name roomName, pcr.site_id siteId, pcr.site_name siteName, pcs.must_number mustNumber, pcs.choice_number choiceNumber, ptt.continuou_num continuouNum FROM pk_curriculum_set pcs RIGHT JOIN pk_teaching_task ptt ON pcs.subject_id=ptt.subject_id AND ptt.task_id=#{taskId} RIGHT JOIN pk_teacher_class_copy ptc ON ptt.teacher_id=ptc.teacher_id AND ptc.task_id=#{taskId} INNER JOIN pk_subject ps ON ptt.subject_id=ps.subject_id INNER JOIN pk_class_room pcr ON ptc.class_id=pcr.class_id AND pcr.task_id=#{taskId} WHERE pcs.task_id=#{taskId} AND pcs.level=#{level} AND ptc.class_id=#{classId};
